refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: This block sets MicroDAQ analog outputs. Block supports different types of MicroDAQ analog outputs, select analog output type by providing 'Converter' parameter accordingly to MicroDAQ hardware configuration. In order to set more then one AI channel user can pass array of channels in block 'Channels' parameter. 'End value' parameter allows to set AO state after simulation end. User can pass one value which will be applied to all channels or can pass an array with end values for used channels.
This block can be used in host simulation mode and for code generation.

member.para: input(1) - AO voltage value (scalar or vector)

simplelist.member: mdaq_ao_write : Sets MicroDAQ analog outputs (AO) from Scilab script

member.link: Link to the Scilab help page
